job_history.work_description: Work with/teach children from ages 6 weeks to Pre-K. Enforce rules for behavior and procedures for maintaining order among classes. Show love and compassion to the children on a daily basis. Teach the children God's love through my interactions with them and by giving positive praise and affection. Work with/Assist the classroom teachers by following their schedules and lesson plans.

Taught 60 minute Physical Education classes to kindergarten, first, third, fourth, and fifth grade students. Along with Physical Education, my classes also included anatomy (muscle and bone) and nutrition. Safety in the gym/field/classroom was emphasized on a daily basis. Lesson plans were developed in accordance to the unit plan for the semester. Critical thinking questions and/or scenarios were created and implemented for the students to use on a daily basis. Assessments were done on a bi-monthly basis through various methods such as; paper and pencil assessment, peer assessment, and teacher evaluations.

Taught physical education and nutrition classes to children ages 18 months to 5 years old. Made my classes fun and engaging in an environment that was positive and nurturing. Safety was a top priority in my classes. I used positive reinforcement and redirection in order to avoid any behavior or discipline issues. As Manager, I would hire any new coaches we needed and kept them organized and prepared to teach their classes.

skills.name: Teaching
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience teaching children of various ages, including developing lesson plans and implementing assessments, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Classroom Management
skills.explanation: Has consistently enforced rules and procedures to maintain order in classes, showing strong proficiency in classroom management.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has experience managing and hiring coaches, indicating a solid level of proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Physical Education
skills.explanation: Has taught physical education classes to students of various ages, including developing lesson plans and emphasizing safety, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Child Development
skills.explanation: Has experience teaching and caring for children of various ages, showing strong proficiency in child development.

skills.name: Nutrition Education
skills.explanation: Has taught nutrition classes to children, indicating a solid level of proficiency in nutrition education.

skills.name: Safety Management
skills.explanation: Has consistently emphasized safety in classes and activities, showing strong proficiency in safety management.

skills.name: Lesson Planning
skills.explanation: Has experience developing lesson plans for various classes, showing strong proficiency in lesson planning.

skills.name: Assessment and Evaluation
skills.explanation: Has experience developing and implementing assessments, indicating a solid level of proficiency in assessment and evaluation.
